title: Bug 49536 - If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed on it and accessing a URL, the system returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The system should return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download and start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
2. Access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance.
3. Observe that the system returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
